product_name: Vittoria Open Triathlon Evo Foldable Tire - 700 x 22
long_description: Vittoria Open Triathlon Evo foldable clincher tire is designed specifically for the demands of time-trials, and offers an aerodynamic design with lightweight puncture protection. Super-supple 320 tpi casing is backed with a puncture-resistant belt to increase the chances that your race won't end prematurely because of a puncture. Narrow 22mm width reduces the tire's profile, improving aerodynamic performance-critical when racing against the clock. Rubber compound is designed for fast-rolling performance, all-conditions grip and high-mileage longevity. Recommended pressure for the Vittoria Open Triathlon Evo foldable clincher tire is 115 - 145 psi (8 - 10 BAR).
short_description: Vittoria Open Triathlon Evo foldable clincher tire is designed specifically for the demands of time-trials, and offers an aerodynamic design with lightweight puncture protection.
